item.title: When kindness becomes a habit, it improves our health
item.description: Whether it's volunteering at a local school or taking soup to a sick neighbor, improving the welfare of others can also improve our own physical and mental health, a sizable body of research shows.

item.title: Richard Perry, record producer behind 'You're So Vain' and other hits, dies at 82
item.description: A recipient of a Grammys Trustee Award in 2015, Richard Perry died at a Los Angeles hospital on Tuesday. Perry was a hitmaking record producer with a flair for both standards and contemporary sounds.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: The Assad regime's fall has freed displaced Syrians stuck in a remote desert camp
item.description: More than 7,000 people had taken shelter in the Rukban camp, near the border with Jordan, many of whom fled the regime and ISIS attacks almost a decade ago.

item.title: Starbucks baristas' 'strike before Christmas' has reached hundreds of U.S. stores
item.description: Starbucks' union says workers are walking off the job at some 300 — out of over 10,000 — stores across the U.S. as contract negotiations falter. The company urges it to return to the bargaining table.
